title: Person Medium Dark Skin Tone Beard
alsoKnownAs: Bearded Person Medium Dark Skin Tone
description: A person with a beard and a medium-dark skin tone. This emoji is used to represent individuals with facial hair and this specific skin tone, often conveying a mature or distinguished appearance.
apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices portrays a person with a medium-dark skin tone, featuring a meticulously rendered beard that adds depth and character. The smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges characteristic of Apple's design language give the figure a friendly and approachable appearance.  It represents masculinity, maturity, or simply a specific individual, conveying presence and gravitas in digital conversations.
